name: DemoGame
description:
This is a really small prototype demo made in Unity 2019.3 in roughly a bit more than a weekend. This is the second time I'm working with Unity (the first time on my own and outside of university) and is mostly done based on the official Manual.

Prototype includes: Prefabs, Assets (free from the store), Animation, Sounds, NavMap Enemies, a controllable Player.

I know it's not much and doesn't even has like a goal or something, but that was not the point. This is meant to be a small test to show my beginner skills in Unity. I'm somewhat happy how fast you can actually make something with Unity and I will probably change things in the future (or just work on a "serious" and "real" project instead) because I really like working on games.
